title: Fate/kaleid liner Prisma☆Illya 2wei Herz! Specials
alternative_title: Fate/Kaleid Liner Prisma Illya 2Wei Herz! Shorts, Fate/kaleid liner プリズマ☆イリヤ ツヴァイ ヘルツ！ショートアニメ
description: The official website of the Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya anime franchise revealed on Friday that the Blu-ray Disc volumes and the limited-edition DVD volumes of the Fate/kaleid liner Prisma Illya 2wei Herz! anime will each contain a five-minute episode of a short anime titled "Beast, Again!" (Beast, Futatabi!).
